New Records: Matt Wallner homered for the second straight game
Key Match Events: Royce Lewis nearly had his sixth career grand slam for Minnesota in the seventh inning
Willi Castro had an RBI single to snap an 0-for-16 skid during a three-run fourth inning for the Twins
Jhoan Duran surrendered three hits in the ninth, including an RBI single by Nolan Schanuel
Pre-Game Insights: Minnesota manager Rocco Baldelli emphasized the importance of strong bullpen performance
Post-Match Reflections: Matt Wallner said 'I think we feel good. Guys getting hits and just continuous hits, driving guys in, in scoring position, is huge for us.'

Rocco Baldelli said 'You could feel the offense kind of brewing there.... You could feel the guys, the good energy, the good at-bats that they gave us. They were really locked in and doing their part in a nice way.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played on September 11, 2024
The Minnesota Twins remain six games behind Cleveland and 1 1/2 behind Kansas City in the AL Central
